title: Work on Thar Block 2 power plant in full swing: Asim Bajwa
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 31 (APP):Special Assistant to the Prime Minister on Information and Broadcasting Lt Gen (retd) Asim Saleem Bajwa on Friday said the work on the 330 MW Thar Block-2 MW power plant was in full swing.
Asim Bajwa, who is also CPEC Authority chairman, in a tweet, the work that was being executed by Thar Energy Limited and HUBCO, was unaffected by COVID-19.
The project had brought an investment of US$500 million and created 805 local direct jobs, he aid, adding its financial close was done on January 31, 2020.
